ygData.subject: Re: Curious on 8 memorized spells for lev 16 through 23  rd level play ers ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail there ! ... I bet they dont want to make them smaller. Maybe its just sort of tactic to make our life harder :) I have the same problem with my shaman and
ygData.messageBody:
Hail there !

Lomack wrote:

> I guess we can always hope that when they release the expansion in about 6+
> months that they will redo the interface and make those spell icons a bit
> smaller so we can fit more in the same space.

I bet they dont want to make them smaller.
Maybe its just sort of tactic to make our life harder :)
I have the same problem with my shaman and hell he has a lot of spells he needs.
If i want to buff one fully up i need to remem all spells because of its numbers.
After that when combat comes in i need to remem all my combat spells (poison, disease,
dd, debuff, heal, ...) thats pain ! :)
oh well i should stop rambling

bye
